review: I love it! Easy to setup and very powerful. I put it on a television in the furthest reach of my house from the wifi router, in a place that typically has spotty wifi connection. It works without issue. Definitely well made.
author: JuanMooreBeer "James A Moore"

review: Quicker than my smart tv with more options.
author: Mensur Buljubasic

review: It was easy setup, works with my Harmony hub universal remote and is pretty quick and easy to use.  NEED MORE CONTENT!  Music and video is just lacking right now and I wanna see new movies and listen to new music but there is no way to just listen to whats new.  3 out of 5 from me but for $19 it does what it says it does.ALSO NEEDS iOS support ASAP!
author: Carlos Silva

review: it is excellent for the price you cannot beat it thank you Amazon
author: Dennis

review: Great product for the price, well worth it.
author: rm

review: Easy to setup and navigate! I love it!
author: Katy Finuc

review: Neat stick to have in the living room or take traveling.Picture quality and sound is great.At least the Tune-In Radio app supports all broadcasting formats something the Roku3 doesn't do.Hope the app developers jump on the bandwagon as this product has potential and the room to grow.Love the youtube app and hope amazon adds the Vudu app down the road.The great thing is it has enough ram not to buffer in the middle of a movie.Glad I grabbed two while prime time members could get them at $19.
author: David M. Moser "Mike in Carolina!"
